name: Salafi Centre of Manchester
description: Salafi centre of Manchester, teaching topics around the correct Islamic Beliefs of Ahlus Sunnah.
address: 2 Dudley St, Cheetham Hill, Manchester, M8 9DA

name: Alhuda
description: Alhuda has been open since 2007 as a masjid and learning centre in Bolton, an area of Greater Manchester. Our Dawah is to call to the Qur'an and Sunnah of the prophet Muhammad صلى الله عليه وسلم, upon the understanding of the Salaf (the righteous predecessors of Islam) in order to practice Islam as it originally was. This is the Salafi methodology.

name: Markaz Bukhari
description: After the great Imām Moḥammad bin Ismā’īl al-Bukhārī (رحمه الله). The Salafī Da’wah began in earnest in January 2011. We initially held fortnightly lessons. which quickly grew to a weekly lesson. The attendance numbers were originally low due to the Da’wah being new to many. The first book we covered was Usūl at Thalātha (3 Principles) and the numbers attending began to grow.

name: Tawheed Rochdale
description: Tawheed Rochdale is an Islamic organisation that calls to the Qur'aan and Sunnah upon the understanding of the Salaf.

name: Salafi Dawah Lancs
description: Calling to the Qur'an & Sunnah upon Methodology of Salaf us-Salih
address: Whitefield Community Centre, 212a Manchester Road, Nelson, BB9 7BY

name: Albaseerah
description: Albaseerah started in the year 2000, stemming from the need to bring authentic Islam to the people of Bradford. From the confined spaces of many a humble abode, the small devoted team worked endlessly to create Islamic awareness through arranging lectures, handing out leaflets, spreading knowledge, and establishing dawah stalls. Now, over 16 years later, by the permission of Allah, this vision has inspired the growth of a whole new community.

name: Masjid al Furqan
description: A Masjid located in the heart of Grangetown, calling to Tawheed using strictly nothing but the Qur'an & Sunnah according to the salaf
address: 105 Roundwell Street, Tunstall, Stoke on Trent, Staffordshire, ST6 5AW

name: Masjid At-Tawheed
description: A Masjid located in the heart of Grangetown, calling to Tawheed using strictly nothing but the Qur'an & Sunnah according to the salaf

name: Masjidus Sunnah An-Nabawiyah
description: The Masjid was opened in the Summer of 2014 and is the result of the efforts of the people of Sunnah locally and across the globe.
address: 125 Mansfield Road, Birmingham, West Midlands B6 6DA

name: Wright Street Mosque
description: The As-Salafi Mosque, also known as 'The Salafi Mosque' or 'Wright Street', is a Salafist mosque founded in 2002 and located in the Small Heath area of Birmingham, metres from the intersection of Muntz and Wright Streets and just behind Coventry Road.
address: Wright St, Small Heath, Birmingham B10 9SP

name: Masjid Bin Baz
description: After months of striving and being patient, by the Grace and Bounties of our Lord, we have completed the purchase of a former church in East London. We are truly humbled by the support we have received from our Brothers and Sisters, the Salafi Centres and Mosques and our beloved Scholars and Du’āt.
address: Masjid Bin Baz, East Road, London, E15 3QR

name: Masjid Dar Us Sunnah
description: Islamic Centre and Mosque calling to the Correct Understanding of Islam upon the Understanding of the Salaf.
address: Shepherd's Bush Market, 41 Lime Grove, London W12 8DQ

name: Salafi Dawah Tooting
description: Established in 2013, Salafi Dawah Tooting aims to cultivate the community generally, and the Muslims specifically upon the correct and sound understanding of Islam i.e. The Qur’ān and Sunnah according to the methodology of the Pious Predecessors (Salaf ul- Sāliḥ).
address: Balham Community Centre, 91 bedord Hill, Balham, London, SW12 9HE

name: Markaz as-Sunnah
description: Markaz us-Sunnah was established in 2014 in the area of Wembley, London, with the intention of propagating the true message of Islam – an adherence to the Qur’ān and Sunnah upon the understanding of the Salaf (the Righteous Predecessors)

name: Markaz Mu'aadh Bin Jabal
description: Markaz us-Sunnah was established in 2014 in the area of Wembley, London, with the intention of propagating the true message of Islam – an adherence to the Qur’ān and Sunnah upon the understanding of the Salaf (the Righteous Predecessors)

name: Markaz Salafi
description: Salfi markaz upon the Quran and Sunnah of the Salaf

name: al Markaz as Salafi Leicestershire
description: Est 2013 in order to Call to Tawheed & the Authentic Sunnah of Rasulullah ﷺ upon the understanding of the Sahaba

name: Daarut Tawheed
description: We are a group of Muslims who wish to spread the Salafi Da'wah by way of Tele-links, Lessons and Lectures. We are aiming to establish a Masjid and Bookstore.

name: The Salafi Bookstore Bradford
description: Walhamdulillah, established since 2004, the SalafiBookstore in Bradford is the only place in Bradford that stocks and distributes materials adhering strictly to the Quran and Sunnah. In November 2012 we relocated to a new location on Great Horton road, Bradford 7. The idea was to have the bookshop and Masjid in one location. All praise be to Allah we were able to achieve this.

name: Salafi Bookstore & Islamic Centre
description: Description required.
address: 472 Coventry Rd, Small Heath, Birmingham B10 0UG
